intro: Ninjas + hyper action + cyberpunk! Cut down everything in your path in the name of revenge, sprinting through this glittering neon concrete jungle.
description:
Kiba was a ninja of his clan, making a living infiltrating and assassinating, until one day, he was falsely accused of murdering his clan leader and chased off by a number of pursuers as a fugitive.

After a struggle to survive, he finds himself in the distant future.

Despite everything, he has no idea where he is, yet he jumps straight into battle, fighting for revenge as he digs deeper into the death of his leader in order to restore his good name...

▶ Welcome to Lust Angels!
Lust Angels is a cyberpunk setting covered with neon signs and holograms. Our fugitive must navigate this metropolis filled with violence, danger, and chaos. Will Kiba ever be able to survive...?!

▶ A story shifting between past and future
A mysterious force of ninjas and soldiers closes in on Kiba, threatening his life. What exactly does Kiba see in this one-versus-many struggle? Why come to the future, and what happened in the past?!

▶ Highly advanced techniques indistinguishable from magic
HANZO'S HOT SUSHI is a shop run by Hanzo, a cybernetics engineer who assists Kiba. Here, Kiba can invest in cybernetics to strengthen his body and acquire new skills. He'll need that strength to survive, unable to let his guard down if he wants to survive.

▶ Only the strong survive
Ninja, samurai, a military facility management AI, and even strategic robot weaponry... All sorts of baddies wish to take Kiba's life. Fight back against the ever-tightening onslaught of enemies to achieve victory!
